Terms & Conditions
------------------

\*\*Two-Way Text Messaging is a chargeable feature. Users are required to pay $10/user/month.

Common questions
----------------

[Do you offer discounts?](https://www.lawcus.com/pricing/#question1)

We offer free accounts for Law Schools, Paralegal Colleges, Students, and discounts for non-profits.

[Is Lawcus secure and my data safe?](https://www.lawcus.com/pricing/#question2)

We're built on Amazon cloud, using the strongest encryption at rest & transition, and your data is backed up daily. We also offer 2-factor authentication.

[Can I migrate data to Lawcus from my current software?](https://www.lawcus.com/pricing/#question3)

Our dedicated database migration team can import all your data from Clio, MyCase, Practice Panther, Rocket Matter, Zola Suite, Lexis Nexis Time Matters, Lexis Nexis PCLaw, Tabs3, CosmoLex, sage Timeslips, Abacus Law, Amicus Attorney, ProLaw and many other applications.

[How much data migration/import cost?](https://www.lawcus.com/pricing/#question4)

Data migration is free of cost for Clio, Mycase, PracticePanther, LawMatics, Zola suite, Cosmolex, Smokeball, Actionstep users subscribing to Business annual plan. If you have a complex data set or migrating from any other systems, please email us at support@lawcus.com for a quote.

[What is the onboarding and training process?](https://www.lawcus.com/pricing/#question5)

We understand moving to a new system is a daunting task. We provide unlimited training including free one-on-one and group training to help your firm in the transition. We usually do three training sessions: 1) Attorney/ paralegal training: this will give an overview of the app from client intake to adding time. 2) Billing training: this will cover creating invoices and trust accounting. 3) Admin training: this will cover all the setups, workflow automation, integrations, etc.

[How often is Lawcus updated?](https://www.lawcus.com/pricing/#question6)

We are constantly developing new functionality to make Lawcus work even better for you. We release new features every month.

[What if we need a more extended trial?](https://www.lawcus.com/pricing/#question7)

Just send us a message and we will extend your trial.

[Refund Policy](https://www.lawcus.com/pricing/#question8)

If you cancel your account, you would not be charged again, but all the charges that have already been incurred for the current billing period would not be refunded. There will be no refunds for data migration services. There will be no refunds for any amounts unused if you cancel your plan (whether monthly or annual subscription). To treat everyone fairly, no exceptions will be made. For more information see our terms & conditions.

Terms & Conditions
------------------

\*\*Two-Way Text Messaging is a chargeable feature. Users are required to pay $10/user/month.

Common questions
----------------

[Do you offer discounts?](https://lawcus.com/pricing/#question1)

We offer free accounts for Law Schools, Paralegal Colleges, Students, and discounts for non-profits.

[Is Lawcus secure and my data safe?](https://lawcus.com/pricing/#question2)

We're built on Amazon cloud, using the strongest encryption at rest & transition, and your data is backed up daily. We also offer 2-factor authentication.

[Can I migrate data to Lawcus from my current software?](https://lawcus.com/pricing/#question3)

Our dedicated database migration team can import all your data from Clio, MyCase, Practice Panther, Rocket Matter, Zola Suite, Lexis Nexis Time Matters, Lexis Nexis PCLaw, Tabs3, CosmoLex, sage Timeslips, Abacus Law, Amicus Attorney, ProLaw and many other applications.

[How much data migration/import cost?](https://lawcus.com/pricing/#question4)

Data migration is free of cost for Clio, Mycase, PracticePanther, LawMatics, Zola suite, Cosmolex, Smokeball, Actionstep users subscribing to Business annual plan. If you have a complex data set or migrating from any other systems, please email us at support@lawcus.com for a quote.

[What is the onboarding and training process?](https://lawcus.com/pricing/#question5)

We understand moving to a new system is a daunting task. We provide unlimited training including free one-on-one and group training to help your firm in the transition. We usually do three training sessions: 1) Attorney/ paralegal training: this will give an overview of the app from client intake to adding time. 2) Billing training: this will cover creating invoices and trust accounting. 3) Admin training: this will cover all the setups, workflow automation, integrations, etc.

[How often is Lawcus updated?](https://lawcus.com/pricing/#question6)

We are constantly developing new functionality to make Lawcus work even better for you. We release new features every month.

[What if we need a more extended trial?](https://lawcus.com/pricing/#question7)

Just send us a message and we will extend your trial.

[Refund Policy](https://lawcus.com/pricing/#question8)

If you cancel your account, you would not be charged again, but all the charges that have already been incurred for the current billing period would not be refunded. There will be no refunds for data migration services. There will be no refunds for any amounts unused if you cancel your plan (whether monthly or annual subscription). To treat everyone fairly, no exceptions will be made. For more information see our terms & conditions.
